articles.title: 2024 WordPress Vulnerability Report Shows Errors Sites Keep Making - Search Engine Journal

articles.content: WordPress security scanner WPScan’s 2024 WordPress vulnerability report calls attention to WordPress vulnerability trends and suggests the kinds of things website publishers (and SEOs) should be look… [+8078 chars]
